record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 4156
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 4156 -- (Senate - November 15, 2007)

[Page: S14434]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 4156 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 4156) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending 2008, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to this measure.

record.chair: The bill will be placed on the calendar.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I note the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The assistant legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
